ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: ALL FORMS, CRITERIA, AND INFORMATION CAN BE FOUND AT HWFSCC.ORG.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: COMMUNITY GRANT DEADLINE AND FURTHER INFORMATION CAN BE FOUND AT HWFSCC.ORG.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: COMMUNITY GRANTS ARE AWARDED TO HEALTHCARE-RELATED ORGANIZATIONS IN THE GEOGRAPHIC AREA SERVED BY OCTORARA, OXFORD, AVON GROVE, KENNETT CONSOLIDATED, AND UNIONVILLE-CHADDS FORD SCHOOL DISTRICTS. THE ORGANIZATIONS ELIGIBLE FOR GRANTS PROVIDE: PRENATAL CARE DENTAL CARE MENTAL HEALTH DIAGNOSIS OR TREATMENT ACCESS TO PHARMACEUTICAL AFFORDABILITY SERVICES OR FACILITATION OF TWO OR MORE OF THE FOUR PRIORITIES ABOVE
